attributes.action: uphold international law and bring Israel to account for its criminal history against palestinians and muslims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can the International Community just stand back and watch the humanitarian atrocities against the palestinians. The Israelis just ignore the united nations, (look at the history) and they continue to kill and steal. Make them accountable, bring them to the international court of justice and execute them publicly or the very least make them return what they stole and displace the israeli state to the moon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
